title: Deep Neural Network Optimization Simulation for Enhancing Security Performance in Cooperative NOMA Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic wireless communication concepts, foundational mathematics/statistics knowledge, and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical skill-based learning for corporate communication security system administrators, conducted in simulation environments resembling real work settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of security performance improvement in antenna-user selection strategies for cooperative NOMA systems.
Learners can perform power allocation and channel capacity prediction using a deep neural network (DNN)-based optimization model.
Learners can analyze and compare security performance metrics (SOP, security throughput) using simulation tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
